explains: vt. 赞美；美化；崇拜（神）；使更壮丽

sentences.en: In their works these authors tended to glorify women's contributions to frontier life.
sentences.cn: 在他们的作品中，这些作者倾向于赞颂妇女对边疆生活的贡献。

sentences.en: They sing hymns to glorify God.
No matter, I do pronounce it. And I glorify it.
sentences.cn: 没有关系，我还是要把它提出来，并且要颂扬它。
